entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Fog dissipating near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 12:44 PM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023
